thread.title: Christopher Columbus Statue Will Stay in Columbus Circle

author: Mara Gay
title: Christopher Columbus Statue Will Stay in Columbus Circle
text:
New York City’s Christopher Columbus statue will stay where it is, Mayor Bill de Blasio said.
A commission formed by the mayor to determine what to do with monuments some consider offensive has recommended that the city move just one statue: that of J. Marion Sims, a 19th century doctor who performed gynecological experiments on American slaves.
“This...
